title: Get the cost records of a BC and ad accounts

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: bc_id
parameters.description: Business Center ID. To obtain the list of Business Centers that you have access to, use /bc/get/ .

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword. The fuzzy match is supported. You can specify an advertiser ID or name as search keyword.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Query start date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (ad account time zone). You can either specify start_date and end_date simultaneously or leave both start_date and end_date unspecified. If you specify start_date and end_date simultaneously, the maximum time range is 365 days. If you leave both start_date and end_date unspecified, the results for the last 90 days will be returned by default.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Query end date, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD (ad account time zone). You can either specify start_date and end_date simultaneously or leave both start_date and end_date unspecified. If you specify start_date and end_date simultaneously, the maximum time range is 365 days. If you leave both start_date and end_date unspecified, the results for the last 90 days will be returned by default.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range : â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: cost_list
fields.description: The list of cost records for each advertiser.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Total cost amount for the advertiser. Example: -1376616.

fields.name: cash_amount
fields.description: Cash cost amount for the advertiser. Example: -1376616.

fields.name: grant_amount
fields.description: Ad credit cost amount for the advertiser. Example: 0.

fields.name: tax_amount
fields.description: Estimated tax amount for the advertiser. Example: -68831.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency of the advertiser. Example: USD .

fields.name: transaction_summary
fields.description: A summary of cost records for the Business Center.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Total cost amount for the Business Center. Example: -484400000.

fields.name: cash_amount
fields.description: Cash cost amount for the Business Center. Example: -484400000.

fields.name: grant_amount
fields.description: Ad credit cost amount for the Business Center. Example: 0.

fields.name: tax_amount
fields.description: Estimated tax amount for the Business Center. Example: -2400000.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency of the Business Center. Example: USD .
